Text: Good stuff. However, some of the sites listed at the end of an article with the article's author are no longer in use or point to random websites. Also, there needs to be a way to link all pages within a volume to one specific index, this might help a site's validity rather than using each subject within a volume as one site.

Also, when you insert your google account number you will need to search and replace the account number that will be left in place for the google search code. If you don't replace it you're helping bendeek or whoever it belongs to rather than helping yourself.
So in other words he's a lazy,manipulating, thieving little asshat?
